ValidationRule.description: “BANT” questions are required only at the Validating (Best Case)/Decision (Commit) stages and only for new opportunities (create date since May/2022).
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( IF( AND( $Profile.Name <> '#Alternate Channel Manager', $Profile.Name <> '#CTF Small Business User', $Profile.Name <> 'Partner Support Team',
OR(
ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Validating'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Decision')) ),
OR( ISBLANK(BudgetText__c), ISBLANK(Budget__c), ISBLANK(Authority__c), ISBLANK(Need__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(NeedNumber__c)),
ISBLANK(Timeline_From__c), ISBLANK(Timeline_To__c) ), false ), DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATE(2022, 5, 1) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: “BANT” questions are required at the Validating (Best Case) and Decision (Commit) stages.
